definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: She is understudying Hu Die, a famous star.
sentences.chinese: 她正臨時代替著名的明星胡蝶。

sentences.english: He was carrying a butterfly net, and a box for putting butterflies in.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着一個捕蝶網和一個用來裝胡蝶的盒子。

sentences.english: The night, Hu Die night did not return, she crashed in the river the boat.
sentences.chinese: 月夜，胡蝶徹夜未歸，她在江裏划船失事了。

definition: Zhou Xuan (1918-1957), Chinese singer and film actress
Xia Yan (1900-1995), Chinese writer, playwright, socialist critic and movie pioneer
Ding Ling (1904-1986), female novelist, author of novel The Sun Shines over the Sanggan River 太陽照在桑乾河上|太阳照在桑干河上, attacked during the 1950s as anti-Party
Mei Lanfang (1894-1961), famous master of Beijing opera, specialist in female roles
Xiao Hong (1911-1942), prominent woman writer, originally from Heilongjiang
Song Qingling or Rosemonde Soong (1893-1981), wife of Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
Joan Chen (1961-), Chinese born American actress
Deng Yingchao (1904-1992), Chinese communist leader, wife of Zhou Enlai 周恩來|周恩来
